text: The 1995 New Zealand rugby league tour of Great Britain was a tour by the New Zealand national rugby league team to compete at the 1995 Rugby League World Cup. New Zealand won Group B of the tournament, before losing to Australia 20-30 in a semi-final. ==Build up== Earlier in the year, New Zealand played two test matches against France, winning one and drawing the other. New Zealand then played a three match test series against Australia, losing all three tests. ==Staff== *Head coach: Frank Endacott *Assistant coach: Gary Kemble ==Squad== ===Final squad=== {| title: New Zealand at the 1995 Rugby League World Cup
